Yesterday afternoon, after just 3 hours of setting up a

Minh City, Mr. T 68  The age of residence in Go Vap,

C concentration exceeding the critical level. Tran
will be fined from 7 to 8 million VND,

breath. Mr. V, 46 years old, living in 12th year, will

while passing through traffic on the provincial highway,
Cu Chi district, Ho City.  Ho Chi Minh
had a serious shutdown after a traffic accident
between a container truck and a motorbike left
a person in
despair. About 4 p.m., a container truck was driving
on Provincial Highway 8 in the direction of Cu Chi to
Binh Duong when the vehicle reached the intersection with
Road 180.  Binh My commune, Cu Chi district,
collided with a motorbike with license plate number 64
i118 driven by an unidentified man
running in the same direction. The
man fell onto the road and was
hit by a container wheel and died on the
spot.  On the evening of the same day,
C Chi district police and the Northwest traffic police station had just
finished resolving the accident scene in
Tinh Tien Giang. Yesterday, a

had an accident, killing the driver.

Nha Trang city.  People came to the
sand beach right at the foot of the bridge to arbitrarily scoop
up sand and transport it to the sea to use for fishing.
It is known that the new Som Bong bridge was only
put into use last September.
These are the images recorded
this morning.  Yesterday, December 2, many
fishermen took turns going to the foot of the glossy gray bridge to
shovel sand into bags and then
transfer them to boats anchored
on the river. Each boat had
hundreds of sandbags continuously going in and out of the gate.  It is
known from the local sea that the above sandbags are
used by fishermen to keep the nets submerged under
the sea for the fishing season of Hung steel
in the waters of Nha Trang Bay. Digging
for sand right at the foot of the new shiny gray bridge
will seriously affect the sea.  It is important to the
longevity of the bridge, changing the flow,
causing flooding in the sea area close to the foot of the bridge.
This situation needs to be
corrected by the authorities. Ladies and gentlemen, a group of athletes has
just conquered the peak of Mount Orizaba,
5,600 m higher, in  Mexico worth mentioning is that all 16
members participating in this journey are
very special, they are all
cancer survivors.
This is the challenge of the peak organization
hoping for an initiative born in France.
Celebrating life after cancer, the
adventure begins with a night to
acclimatize the members to the environment at an
altitude of 4,200 m, then the group hikes
steep paths cut through
some volcanic rocks.  where there is also Snow, the
rugged terrain has hindered at
least four members who lost their limbs
after bone cancer and had to wear
prosthetic limbs. I was surprised at what I
could do. It's like when you fight
fight the disease you go along you
fight there are ups and downs the mountain top
gets closer as the day begins to darken
after five to 7 hours of effort about 10 people
have reached the goal peak association
of Hope has  started 30 years ago in France to
support young people who are
facing cancer. Many
of the members are very proud to
say they have gone through many battles
and will not give up hope to
live.  In Germany, Santa Claus not only crawls

This activity has attracted many
visitors to the aquarium.
Munich Palace at Munich Palace, two
silent staff dressed as Santa Claus and
his servant KN r's companion
According to German legend KN r often carries a
long stick with Santa Claus,
this character often  They give children candy
when they are good and will punish

stick. These two employees are quite good at swimming silently
and they have had a diving license for a long time. The

and are rewarded accordingly.  According to the

Christmas characters will perform the
fish feeding show twice more at the aquarium on December
6 and 9. The
Munich Aquarium is famous for having the

pajama sharks, zebra sharks and
Japanese carpet sharks.
When Christmas and New Year are

in Austria.  announced the
invention of the snow globe more than 100
years
ago. The manufacturing staff had 50 employees and

grandfather of the current owner of the
third Edin Pegy facility was a
medical instrument manufacturer who sought to improve the
performance of operating room light bulbs. He filled
a glass ball with water to increase the
light concentration.  The morning was groping. Looking for
him, he stuffed a few grains of powder inside.
The falling grains of powder reminded him
of Snow. And so the snow globe
was accidentally born. Over the past 100 years,

country. The CRV museum in Paris, France,
has just unveiled a wax statue of a female scientist
who was originally a researcher,
animal activist, and humanist.  The
world's leading anthropologist at the wax
statue unveiling ceremony with the
appearance of the real film is Ms. Jan
Gudo, 89 years old this year. The implementation team
portrayed the typical image of
this researcher in a camouflage costume.  The
page and the wrong tube in my hand
felt like I saw myself in a mirror.
It reminded me of the
time I spent living in the forest with my lovers. I
believe those were the best days of
my life. The British scientist spent  spent
his life researching chimpanzees
and discovering the ability to make tools in
these primates, a discovery that
changed the scientific community's previous view
that humans are the
only animals that know how to make tools.  The
image of Mrs. Jen Good playing with and loving
chimpanzees like a mother has
become a worldwide symbol of
eliminating the gap between humans and
animals. Now, even though she is old, she still
continue to participate in activities calling for
animal conservation to warn of
environmental dangers and global biodiversity loss.
